commands.description: Start the agent cooperation loop to automate Copilot interactions.
Resume the paused agent cooperation loop.
Open the settings panel to configure LLM, files, and spec resources.
Select files for LLM review (multi-select, glob, or manual paths).
Create a template JSON instruction file.
Validate all JSON instruction files in the instructions folder.
Run an automation job from a JSON instruction file.
Open the log viewer panel to inspect interaction logs.
Send a custom prompt to Copilot Chat.
Accept the current Copilot inline suggestion.
Manually log a message to the interaction log.
